suncertify.client
Class DataAccessFacade

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--suncertify.client.DataAccessFacade
public class DataAccessFacade
extends java.lang.Object

DataAccessFacade provides an easy and effective way to getting information about the database. It is important available only the necessary methods for accessing of available truly service , and this way doesnt give knowledge of the entire complexity of system.

Version:
1.2 01 Apr 2003
Author:
Francisco Carlos
